Package it.unicam.cs.formula1.Bot

Class DefaultBot

java.lang.Object
it.unicam.cs.formula1.Bot.DefaultBot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bot
public class DefaultBot extends Object implements Bot
Default implementation of the Bot interface. Provides methods to update the bots position and calculate next moves.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DefaultBot(String name, Position startPosition, Movement movement, TrackOperation trackOperation)
    Constructs a new DefaultBot with the specified name, starting position, movement, track operation, and random number generator.
